DataListSpec.Name: Website Child Search Partner Data List
DataListSpec.Description: A list of Partners that have specific reservation keys.
DataListSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

SPDataList.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATALIST_WEBSITE_CHILDSEARCH_PARTNER as set nocount on;
select ID, PARTNERID, DESCRIPTION from dbo.USR_WEBSITE_CHILDSEARCH_PARTNER
